cta_header: Calculate and explore the legal and regulatory rules {forCountry}.
cta_explore: {cta_explore_link} through the history and values of the currently modelled {parametersCount, number} law parameters and read the formula code that makes {variablesCount, number} variables computable.
cta_api: {cta_api_link} to calculate them in any app.
cta_openfisca: This model is created with {cta_openfisca_link}, a free and open-source computation engine that makes law computable in a collaborative and transparent way.
noResultsFor: No element in the current model matches “{input}”.
parameterNotInLegislation: The legislation defining this parameter is not in effect
entitySingleIntroduction: This is a {entityLink} of the tax and benefit system.
forEternity: which is the eternity. Its value is constant over time
noFormulaParagraph: It does not have any formula and therefore is {formulaNotComputable}. It can be used only as an input for computation.
checkChangelog: Check the spelling of the requested URL. If this link used to work and doesn't anymore, check the {changelogURLLink}.
notParamNotVariable: '{inputValueRef}' is neither a parameter nor a variable in OpenFisca.
explore: Explore OpenFisca's parameter and variable database
seeOtherResults: See the other {otherResultsCount} variables and parameters
api-error: Unable to reach the OpenFisca Web API.
